name: DRAGULA: Blood Moon Racing
description:
DRAGULA: Blood Moon Racing is a racing shoot-'em-up with occult and classic monster theming! Shoot and navigate your way through an arcade-style screen to scrape by spooky monsters and moving obstacles!

Made by:

  • Andre Nyte - Composer
  • Grahm Nesbitt - Composer
  • Citrus Lasko - Writer
  • Jamie -  Character Artist
  • Kerina McCarthy - Character Artist

Made for use with a steering wheel/X-box 360 controller! Also supports mouse and keyboard game-play!

Currently has:

  • 4 Spooky Cars
  • 3 Swanky Racers
  • 11 Enemy Types
  • 3 Playable Tracks
  • 2 Game Modes
  • Top 5 High Score List

Made for PIG Squad's Summer Slow Jams June 2019!
